eu.ueb.acem.web.viewbeans

Class SortableTableBean<E extends Comparable<E>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.ueb.acem.web.viewbeans.TableBean<E>
      • eu.ueb.acem.web.viewbeans.SortableTableBean<E>
  • Type Parameters:
    E - A domain view bean, chosen from the eu.ueb.acem.web.viewbeans.* packages
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    @Component(value="sortableTableBean")
@Scope(value="view")
public class SortableTableBean<E extends Comparable<E>>
extends TableBean<E>
    A extended TableBean to display domain view beans in a table and sort them, if they implement the Comparable interface.
    Since:
    2014-03-06
